name: Juniper Sheriff
movement: walking speed of 40 feet, allowing quick engagement
description: The Juniper Sheriff is a small fey creature known for its agile build, embodying the essence of a guardian of truth.
memorable: Its unique abilities focus on enforcing honesty and detecting lies in others.
goals: To maintain integrity and truth within its vicinity.
relations: Can cooperate with other law-abiding creatures or fey.
environment: Typically found in areas where honesty is upheld, such as enchanted glades or mystical forests.
strengths: Possesses an Aura of Honesty that enforces truth-telling.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and resilience, making it vulnerable in direct confrontations.
attacks: Wields a saber for melee attacks and can cast Bitter Truth for psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Honesty, which compels creatures to avoid lying in proximity.
senses: Has passive Perception of 15, making it highly perceptive.
skills: Proficient in Perception, able to detect deceptions effectively.
additional_information: Aura of Honesty creates a 10-foot radius
Knows if a lie is spoken nearby
Remembers all creatures it has encountered
Has advantage on insight and perception checks for familiar creatures
spellcasting: Can cast Bitter Truth, dealing psychic damage and creating disadvantage on saving throws against its aura.
